script_segments.audio_text: This one morning habit changed everything for me.
Instead of checking my phone, I spend 10 minutes journaling. Just three things I'm grateful for and one goal for the day.
After 90 days, my productivity doubled. I'm more focused, less anxious, and actually enjoying my work.
Try it tomorrow. Comment below what you're grateful for right now.
